item.title: [PI]::help subjecthere[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:400589”]if (playerCommand.startsWith("help")) { String input = playerCommand.substring(5); if (input.length < 1) return; c.getPA().showInterface(8134); if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("herblore")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Herblore Guide", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@To do herblore, you must blah blah blah", 8145); } else if (input.equalsIgnoreCase("slayer")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Slayer Guide", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@To do slayer, you must blah blah blah", 8145); } }hopefully you understand it[/quote]
Got it, thank you very much.

item.title: [PI]::help subjecthere[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I want to make a command that opens up an interface when they type in ::help subject here.
I have no idea how to do it, but maybe I can give an image of what I’m kind of looking for:

f (playerCommand.startsWith("help")) { if inputEqualsIgnoreCase("herblore") { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Herblore Guide", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@To do herblore, you must blah blah blah"", 8145); } else { if inputEqualsIgnoreCase("slayer") { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Slayer Guide", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@To do slayer, you must blah blah blah"", 8145); } }

Read full topic
